name: Berserk Mode
ability:
Rage
Attacks have a 20% chance to apply a bleed effect that deals 10% maximum health for 3 turns.

name: Big Brain
ability:
Brainiac
On entry, Strike the enemy with divine light, dealing 75% of the supported card's damage. In addition prevent the supported card's skill from being disabled.

name: Binding Vow
ability:
Sorcery Knowledge
Upon first fatal blow, revive to 85% HP in exchange for 25% of your damage.
This support Skill is limited to one use only.

name: Binding Light
ability:
Seal Of Restriction
When the supported card is defeated, the opponent's ability is disabled for 2 turns.

name: Black Flash
ability:
Critical Focus
While equipped, the supported card has a 45% chance every other attack to land a critical hit, dealing 150% damage.
Each critical hit has a 30% chance to trigger a follow-up strike for 75% damaage, with the roll made after each successful hit (allowing multiple follow-up attacks if RNG permits)

name: Black Slime
ability:
Slime Coat
Reduce all incoming damage to the supported card by 60% on the first turn and 40% on the second turn.

name: Cursed Ledger
ability:
Life Siphon
Reduces the health of the entire enemy party by 2.5% after every other attack.

name: Divine Tree
ability:
Fruit Of Life
When the supported card dies, transfer 25% of its damage to the next ally card.

name: Dragon Sin Blades
ability:
Double Strike
20% Chance for the supported card to attack a second time dealing 50% of the original damage.

name: Fallen Knight
ability:
Harvest
When the support card is defeated, all allies receive a buff for 15% of the supported card's max health and damage.

name: Fox Cloak
ability:
Nine Tails Wrath
When the supported card is below 50% health, apply a burn that deals 3.5% maximum health and transfers across cards.

name: Froststorm Blade
ability:
Ice Zone
20% chance to freeze the opponent for one turn after the supported card attacks.

name: Galaxy Hero
ability:
Galaxy Impact
For every party member supported by Galaxy Hero, buff the supported card's stats by 10%.

name: Heart Of The Cards
ability:
Forbidden Knowledge
When below 50% health; take 40% reduced damage.

name: Hidden Monarch
ability:
Ruler's Order
After attacking, heal for 10% of the damage dealt to the opponent.

name: Holy Staff
ability:
Divine Strike
20% Chance to heal 15% maximum health after attacking.

name: Limitless
ability:
Infinity
When the supported card gets hit for the first time while on the field, nullify all damage.

name: Mech Contract
ability:
Mech Summon
Reduce all incoming damage by 25%.

name: Music Idol
ability:
Melodic Tone
If the opponent's card is more common than the supported card, disable their ability for 2 turns.

name: Mystic Spheres
ability:
Wish Fulfillment
On entry, randomly grant one of the following buffs:
- 20% bonus max health
- 20% bonus damage
- 20% chance to dodge attacks

name: Ninja Vest
ability:
Demon's Blessing
On entry, boosts the supported card's health by 10%.

name: Null Blade
ability:
Apocalyptic Slash
Disables the opponent's ability for one turn when the supported card enters.

name: Orb Of Dominance
ability:
Domination
On entry, if the opponent has less damage than you, disable their ability for 2 turns and boost your damage by 20%.

name: Red Thorn
ability:
Red Fragment
On entry, the supported card has a 50% chance to dodge the first 2 attacks and gain a 15% damage boost while the dodge is active.

name: Reversed Curse Technique
ability:
Hyper Regeneration
After each enemy attack, heal for 85% of the damage received in exchange for 15% of your max health.
This support Caard is limited to 3 activations, and healing will not exceed your maximum health.

name: Sacred Art Uzumaki
ability:
Maximum Uzumaki
After attacking, 20% chance to hurl Uzumaki at the opponent dealing 2x of the supported cards damage. Each time this activates, drain the supported card's health by 35% of it's maximum health.

name: Sealed Cube
ability:
Eternal Imprisonment
The first attack by an opponent will cause the opponent to be imprisoned for 1 turn.

name: Shadow Mage
ability:
Shadow Ball
After the supported card attacks, shoot a fireball that deals 25% of the supported card's damage.

name: Shinobi Cells
ability:
Nature Wrath
After defeating an opponent, heal for 50% of their maximum health.

name: Sky Drum
ability:
Nature's Lightning
When the supported card enters the field, call down lightning that does 25% of the supported card's damage to the current enemy. Additionally, there is a 40% chance to stun enemies for 1 turn when they enter the field.

name: Slayer Mark
ability:
Awaken
While on the field, the supported card will survive the first fatal attack with 1 health.

name: Substitution Log
ability:
Substitution
10% chance to dodge an attack.

name: Truck-Kun
ability:
High-Speed Accident
If the supported card is defeated and the enemy card is lower than 30% max health, the enemy is automatically defeated.

name: Truth Seeking Orbs
ability:
Path of Truth
On entry, disable the enemy's support card for 2 turns in exchange for 10% of your damage.

name: Undead Staff
ability:
Overload
For each enemy card that has been defeated by the supported card, add 25% of their damage to the staff. When the supported card is defeated, unleash an attack on the enemy card using the total accumulated damage, up to a maximum of 150% of the supported card's damage.

name: Vase Of Greed
ability: 20% chance to increase all living party members' health and damage by 10% after attacking.
